name: df-grisom
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cgrisom, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, copab(s2, s3, w3a(wf1o(cv(s2), cfv(cvtx, cv(s0)), cfv(cvtx, cv(s1))), wf1o(cv(s3), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(s0))), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(s1)))), wral(s4, cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(s0))), wceq(cima(cv(s2), cfv(cfv(ciedg, cv(s0)), cv(s4))), cfv(cfv(ciedg, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s3), cv(s4)))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ GrIsom =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { < s2, s3 > |((s2 :(Vtx ` s0)‚Üî(Vtx ` s1))‚àß(s3 : dom((iEdg ` s0))‚Üî dom((iEdg ` s1)))‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà dom((iEdg ` s0)),(s2 "((iEdg ` s0)` s4))=((iEdg ` s1)`(s3 ` s4))))})
comment: Define the class of all isomorphisms between two graphs. (Contributed by AV, 11-Dec-2022.)
